lead_paragraph: Stephen Curry's return from injury was cut short on Saturday with a knock to his bruised left shin and his early exit showed how vulnerable the Golden State Warriors could be without their MVP.

headline.print_headline: Curry's Return Cut Short After Knock on Bruised Shin
headline.main: Curry's Return Cut Short After Knock on Bruised Shin

snippet: Stephen Curry's return from injury was cut short on Saturday with a knock to his bruised left shin and his early exit showed how vulnerable the Golden State Warriors could be without their MVP....
